scenerymanager.SceneryManager Class Reference

The SceneryManager class handles loading scenery configuration and selection of scenery items depending on terrain. More...

def selectScenery
 Choose an item from the set available for the given terrain, picking only from items that can be "planted" on blocks with the given adjacency signature.

 sceneryConfigCache

Detailed Description

The SceneryManager class handles loading scenery configuration and selection of scenery items depending on terrain.
